Title: Silverlight Code Camp Reference Implementation
Description:
Silverlight Code Camp Website Australia 2011. 

Technology: C#, Silverlight, Asp.Net MVC, jQuery

Features: CodeCamp Sessions, Location Map, User Voting, Registration (via EventBrite), Down Level Experience, Mobile Browsers friendly CSS
